entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
